entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: @Acosta According to @PressSec, being tested is NONSENSICAL so why is the White House now testing everyone, everyday before entering work? Bet Kayleigh is happy to take that test today, tomorrow, and the next day while Americans risk their lives and die because it’s #NONSENSICAL #COVID19
